name: Sentinels (itch) (Faer, Bilzeiboube)
description:
Sentinels is a game about a Grandma and a little boy triying to survive the apocalypse. In this narrative game, you play as the grandma and must discuss talk with the boy in order to keep his mind far from any trauma.

There's multiple endings, so play as much as you can ! There's 5 of them.
Every action is changing the ending.
Esc quits the game.

Also, this is the first full game of the UNISQUID SQUAD !

You can find Faer on twitter : @Faer_Pixel

---------------------------------------------------------
Some hints (DON'T READ IF YOU WANT TO DISCOVER THE GAME BY YOURSELF AT 100%)

-> Talk take 2 Energies and 2 Turns.

-> Question take 2 Energies but 1 Turn

-> Search take 0E but 3T

-> Play take 5E but 1T (The next "search" action cost now 2T)

-> Rest add you 1E by Turns lefts +1E.
